casebody.data:
Charles E. REED, petitioner,
v.
PROCTOR & GAMBLE MANUFACTURING COMPANY. No. 13-1405. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 6, 2014.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Justice ALITOtook no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
